sentences.pinyin: zhè zhī bǐ jí qí pián yi

sentences.simplifiedText: 虽然这个城市的房价极其昂贵，但他依然决定在这里买房。
sentences.traditionalText: 雖然這個城市的房價極其昂貴，但他依然決定在這裡買房。
sentences.pinyin: suī rán zhè gè chéng shì de fáng jià jí qí áng guì, dàn tā yī rán jué dìng zài zhè lǐ mǎi fáng
sentences.translation: Although the housing prices in this city are extremely high, he still decided to buy a house here.
